ygData.subject: Re: fight?
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine silently moves through the tall grass circling the Tiger, he stays low and lets out a Deep, low howl. Lunarpine doesn t want to kill the creature

Lunarpine silently moves through the tall grass circling the Tiger, 
he stays low and lets out a Deep, low howl.

Lunarpine doesn't want to kill the creature unless he has to, this 
could be the ancestor of somebodys pet.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> the tiger hears the howl and moves in closer.  it doesn't enter the 
> clearing yet. It sniffs and looks around. Years of successful 
hunting 
> had taught this tiger patients is good to have. And timing is 
> everything.  It crouched down in the tall grasses and slowly 
> approached the spot where Lunarpine was rolling.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Lunarpine hears the low growl and knows he's being followed, he 
> > enters a patch of high grass and rolls around on the ground for a 
> > bit, the concentrated smell should confuse his stalker. He 
circled 
> > around and let out a high pitched howl, it would attract 
attention 
> > but it would also let it know that he knew that it was there.
> >
